name: Sanouva Hotel

reviews.title: Great Choice
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel from the 19-22 Aug 12, didn't book it via an agent, researched a few hotel before we came, arrived in Saigon and they had vacancies. Room 605 which was a Delux room which was at the back of the Hotel and very quiet at night time, good Wi Fi connection in the room also. The room also had a large window which was good, everything was very clean and the room was cleaned every day. Hotel was central to District 1, with all the main tourist sights being in walking distance.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall great value for money, hotel was $72 per night.
reviews.title: Deserving of the good reviews!

reviews.text: My girlfriend and I stayed here for 4 nights and were really pleased. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful, and the bedrooms were a good size for our needs, clean and well equipped. Breakfast was more than adequate.
reviews.title: Centrally Located Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in a great location, 2 mins walk from Ben Tanh market, 10 mins walk from the back packer area with its bars and restaurants, or 10-15 min walk from the more expensive bars, shops and restaurants near the Opera house.
reviews.title: great location

reviews.text: The war museum, reunification palace and Notre Damn cathedral are within around 10 min walk. We didn't really need to use a taxi much during our stay. If you do however, try use Vinasun (especially from the airport), I believe this is the biggest taxi firm in HCM and is our experience one of the cheaper ones.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location was further from Saigon River but nevertheless nearby to Ben Thanh market which was a plus. Bought the rooms during their promotion with free pick up from airport. Rooms were Clean and Comfortable. Breakfast had a lot of variety and was different everyday. We really enjoyed our stay especially with Mr Quox who was very helpful throughout our stay
reviews.title: Comfortable Stay with free pick up from airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for one night on our return to Saigon before flying out the following day. We'd previously stayed at another hotel in Saigon for three nights earlier in our holiday and thought that we'd try somewhere else for the night - we wished we'd gone back to the hotel which we'd originally stayed in (see other Saigon review).
reviews.title: Very average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was ok (although little bit small), free Wi-Fi, good bathroom, safe, cupboard space but this hotel lacked the atmosphere and staff who'd go the extra mile which we found in other hotels in Vietnam.
reviews.title: Good location, good hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was awful - it was a buffet but not all the food was covered (the bacon was just left on a plate and the flies were all over it) and the fried eggs (which were covered) were black and blue in places), cutlery wasn't particularly clean and we found that there were a large number of staff near the bar area doing nothing (they only sprang in to action to take our breakfast voucher). The hotel really needs to up its game on the breakfast front - its not difficult to get it wrong but they got it very wrong.
reviews.title: Just average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In summary, we felt this was a fairly average dated hotel and you could find a better place to stay at the same price or cheaper.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Location

description: Sanouva is a newly established hotel, at the heart of Ho Chi Minh City, one block away from Ben Thanh market, the most famous traditional market in Saigon. Our 53 elegant rooms are all equipped with center air-conditioning system, cable LCD TV, IDD Telephone, and free Wireless Broadband Internet at your fingertips. Each room also has its own bathroom with shower and built in hair dryer, a well stocked mini-bar, safety box to guarantee comfort during guest’s stay. Our hotel provides our guests with a luxurious restaurant with professional chefs to deliver you the finest cuisine. We put our very best effort to ensure guest stay at our humble establishment, Sanouva, a pleasurable, comfortable and enjoyable one. We wish to make guest’s experience with us as mesmerizing as their visit to our city.
